title: Epic 1 - Loan Application Portal
description: Develop a customer-facing portal to allow applicants to submit loan requests, upload documents, and track application status.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Loan Application Form
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to complete and submit a loan application form online so that I can apply for a loan without visiting the bank.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Design Loan Application Form UI
tasks.description: Create responsive and accessible web forms for personal and home loans.
acceptance_criteria: Form fields align with loan requirements.
Validation is applied to all mandatory fields.
Supports both personal and home loan types.

tasks.title: Task 2 - Implement Application Submission Logic
tasks.description: Connect form submission to backend API for loan data persistence.
acceptance_criteria: Loan data saved to database via API.
Confirmation message displayed upon successful submission.

userStories.title: User Story 2 - Application Status Tracking
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to track my loan application status so that I stay informed throughout the process.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Build Status Tracker Component
tasks.description: Create UI component to display real-time application progress.
acceptance_criteria: Displays status: Submitted, Under Review, Approved, or Rejected.

title: Epic 2 - Automated Document Verification
description: Automate document verification using OCR to reduce manual processing time and improve accuracy.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Document Upload & OCR Processing
userStories.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically verify my uploaded documents so that I don't have to manually validate them.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Integrate OCR API
tasks.description: Connect with external OCR service for identity and income document verification.
acceptance_criteria: OCR API successfully extracts text from uploaded documents.
Verification status returned and stored in system.

tasks.title: Task 2 - Handle Verification Failures
tasks.description: Implement fallback for failed OCR checks.
acceptance_criteria: System flags failed verifications for manual review.
Users receive notification for re-upload if required.

title: Epic 3 - Credit Check Integration
description: Connect with external credit bureaus to assess applicant creditworthiness automatically.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Credit Bureau Integration
userStories.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically fetch credit scores from the Credit Bureau API so that I can make informed approval decisions.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Implement API Integration
tasks.description: Connect backend to Credit Bureau API using secure authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Credit score fetched successfully for each applicant.
API error handling implemented for unavailability.

tasks.title: Task 2 - Display Credit Data in Dashboard
tasks.description: Show fetched credit data on the loan management dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Credit score visible in application details view.
System logs each API request for compliance.

title: Epic 4 - Notifications and Reporting
description: Develop automated notifications and reporting capabilities for both customers and administrators.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Notification System
userStories.description: As a user, I want to receive automated notifications about my loan status so that I stay updated without manual follow-ups.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Integrate Email & SMS Services
tasks.description: Connect with Twilio and SendGrid for SMS and email notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications sent when loan status changes.
SMS and email templates are customizable.

userStories.title: User Story 2 - Reporting Dashboard
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want a reporting dashboard to analyze loan application trends and system performance.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Build Reporting Dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create analytics dashboard with charts and KPIs.
acceptance_criteria: Displays total applications, approvals, and rejections.
Reports exportable as PDF or CSV.
